caption.p: NPA results of the asthma cases. a: Patients with acute exacerbation of asthma and stable asthma with or without microorganisms detected in the NPA. b: Percentages of individual microorganism found in NPA in the subjects. ADV = adenovirus ; CoV=Coronavirus; Flu A = influenza A; HMPV = Human metapneumovirus; HPIV=Human parainfluenza virus; M pneumoniae = Mycoplasma pneumoniae; HRVs = Human rhinovirus; RSV = Respiratory syncytial virus
